Class UserControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.WAT.airbnb.rest.users.UserControl

  • @Path(value="/user")
public class UserControl
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles all user functionality Paths: /signup /login /passreset /getuser/{userId} /getuser /updateuser /verifytoken /changemail /updateprofilepicture
